channel.title: Rs2 #377
channel.description:
Base: Rs377d. Programmer: Fire cape.
[size=18pt]What is Rs2?[/size] Rs2 is based of rs377d, which is a framework wrote by Blakeman8192. The aim of rs2 is to create the first playable 377 server. Why? because, in all theese years of runescape private servers there have been no playable 377 servers. All servers close to the "377" revision have been made using "Look a like clients".
[size=18pt]Update Log:[/size] 10th July 2010: ActionButtons packet finished. 10th July 2010: Commands packet finished. 11th July 2010: Skill handling is done. 11th July 2010: Added an animation system. 11th July 2010: Logout packet done. 11th July 2010: First click npc packet done. 11th July 2010: Second click npc packet done. 11th July 2010: Attack npc packet done.
[size=18pt]Media:[/size] [IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2qkl7qh.jpg[/img]

item.title: Rs2 #377
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

Base: Rs377d.
Programmer: Fire cape.

[size=18pt]What is Rs2?[/size]
Rs2 is based of rs377d, which is a framework wrote by Blakeman8192.
The aim of rs2 is to create the first playable 377 server.
Why? because, in all theese years of runescape private servers there have been no playable 377 servers.
All servers close to the “377” revision have been made using “Look a like clients”.

[size=18pt]Update Log:[/size]
10th July 2010: ActionButtons packet finished.
10th July 2010: Commands packet finished.
11th July 2010: Skill handling is done.
11th July 2010: Added an animation system.
11th July 2010: Logout packet done.
11th July 2010: First click npc packet done.
11th July 2010: Second click npc packet done.
11th July 2010: Attack npc packet done.

[size=18pt]Media:[/size]

2qkl7qh.jpg759×501

Read full topic
